article_title: Is Carly Fiorina Considering a Presidential Run in 2016?
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

article_metadata.description: It’s likely to be a crowded field for Republicans in 2016 but Carly Fiorina could certainly stand out, and not just because she’s a woman.
